fr.rabian.ovhApi.beans

Class Consumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.rabian.ovhApi.beans.Consumer

  • public class Consumer
extends Object
    Represents a consumer used to access the API.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Adrien Rabian

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getConsumerKey()
      Returns the consumer's key.
      List<ScopeElement> getScope()
      Returns the authorization's scope.
      String getState()
      Returns the current state of the consumer's token As for v0.1, this attribute is not correctly implemented.
      String getValidationUrl()
      Returns the authentication URL.
      void setScope(List<ScopeElement> scope)
      Sets the scope for future use.

        public String getState()
        Returns the current state of the consumer's token As for v0.1, this attribute is not correctly implemented.
        Returns:

      • setScope

        public void setScope(List<ScopeElement> scope)
        Sets the scope for future use. CAUTION : this does not change the actual scope on OVH's side. You have to create a new token instead.
        Parameters:
        scope - Scope to set
